text:
[A] [Discard a Character card with either ::Familia::, ::Guild::, or :: Hostess of Fertility:: from hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, draw a card.
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 5 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, draw up to 1 card.

[C] If you have 1 or fewer other Characters, this gains +1500 Power.
[A] At the start of your Opponent's Attack Phase, you may move this to an empty Slot in your Front Row that has an Opponent's Character Opposite that Slot.
[A] [Put the top card of your Library in your Clock] At the start of the Encore Step, if there are no other Rested Characters in your Front Row, you may pay cost. If so, Rest this.

[C] During your turn, this gains +4000 Power.
[A] During battles involving this, when Damage taken by you is Cancelled, you may return this to hand.

[C] If you have 2 or more other Characters with either ::Familia::, ::Guild::, or :: Hostess of Fertility::, this gains +2000 Power.
[A] ENCORE [Discard a Character card from your hand to the Waiting Room]
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 3000, Level 2 [(1) Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +X Power. X = 500 times Level of that Character.
[S] [(2) Rest this] Choose a Character in your Waiting Room with either ::Familia::, ::Guild::, or :: Hostess of Fertility:: and return it to your hand.
[C] All your Characters gain +2 Soul.

[C] All of your other "Bell, Seeking Encounters" gain the following ability. "[A] When this attacks, look at the top of your Library and put it either on top or bottom of the Library, and this gains +1000 Power for the turn."
[A] BOND/"Bell, Seeking Encounters" [(1)]

[A] [Discard a Character card with either ::Familia::, ::Guild::, or :: Hostess of Fertility:: from hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 "Status Update", reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.
[A] When this becomes Reversed in battle, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is 0 or lower, you may put that Character on the bottom of the Library.

[C] If there are 2 or fewer cards in your Stock, this gains +1500 Power.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, look at the top card of your Library and put it either on top or bottom of the Library.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, this gain +X Power for the turn. X = 500 times # of your Characters with either ::Familia::, ::Guild::, or :: Hostess of Fertility::.
[A] CX COMBO When this attacks, if "Role of a God" is in the Climax Zone, you may choose a "Status Update" in your hand and Send it to Memory.
--None--
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, this gain +X Power for the turn. X = 1000 times # of your Characters with either ::Familia::, ::Guild::, or :: Hostess of Fertility::.

[C] For each of your Opponent's Back Row Characters, this gains +1500 Power.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, choose up to 1 Character in your hand whose Level is equal to or lower than your Level and put it in any Slot on the Stage, and that Character gains +2000 Power for the turn.
[A] [Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, all players return all cards in their Waiting Rooms to their respective Libraries, then shuffle those Libraries.

Send this to Memory.
[A] RECOLLECTION [Discard a Character card with either ::Familia::, ::Guild::, or :: Hostess of Fertility:: from hand to the Waiting Room, return this to hand] At the start of your Main Phase, if this is in Memory, you may pay cost. If so, look at up to 4 cards from top of your Library and search for up to 4 Characters with either ::Familia::, ::Guild::, or :: Hostess of Fertility::, reveal them, put them in your hand, and put the rest in the Waiting Room.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Climax Zone, choose up to 1 Level 1 or lower Character in your Waiting Room, put it to Stock, and for the turn all of your Characters gains +1 Soul.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, your Opponent declares 0, 1, 2, or 3. Put the top card of your Library in the Waiting Room, and if the Level of the card put in the Waiting Room this way is the same as the number your Opponent declared, draw up to X cards. X = 1 + the number your Opponent declared. (Climax cards are considered Level 0 for this effect)
[A] At the start of your Opponent's Draw Phase, put the top card of your Library in the Waiting Room. If it's Level 1 or higher, you may return this to your hand.

[A] When this attacks, if you have 4 or more other Characters with either ::Familia::, ::Guild::, and/or ::Hostess of Fertility::, choose 1 of your other Characters, and that Character gains +2500 Power for the turn.
[A] CX COMBO [Discard a YELLOW card from hand to the Waiting Room] When this attacks, if "Battle Training" is in the Climax Zone and there are 5 or fewer cards in your Stock, you may pay cost. If so, look at up to 5 cards from top of your Library and search for up to 2 Characters with either ::Familia::, ::Guild::, and/or ::Hostess of Fertility::, reveal them, put them in your hand, and shuffle your Library.

[C] If there are 2 or fewer Climax cards in your Waiting Room, this gets -1 Level while in your hand.
[C] EXPERIENCE If "[Sword Princess] Ais" is in your Level Zone, this gains +1500 Power and cannot be chosen as target of Opponent's effects.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, this gains +4500 Power and the following ability until the next end of your Opponent's turn. "[C] During battles involving this, no player may play BACKUP from hand."

[A] [(1) Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, look at up to X cards from top of your Library, choose up to 1 of them and put it in your hand, and put the rest in the Waiting Room. X = # of your other Characters with either ::Familia::, ::Guild::, and/or ::Hostess of Fertility::.
[S] [(2) Put this in the Waiting Room] If you ae Level 3 or higher, choose an "Ais, Time Between the Two" in your Waiting Room and put it in the Slot this was in.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may choose a card in your Level Zone and a card in your Waiting Room and Swap them.
[A] [(1) Discard a Climax card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose a Climax card in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[A] [Discard a card from hand to Waiting Room] When this card is placed from hand to Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose a level 0 or lower Character in your Waiting Room and place it to any slot on the Stage.
[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Cost of the Battle Opponent of this is 0 or lower, you may put that Character in Stock. If so, put the bottom card of your Opponent's Stock in the Waiting Room.

[A] When you use the BACKUP of this, if you have a Character with either ::Familia::, ::Guild::, and/or ::Hostess of Fertility::, choose 1 of your Characters in battle, and that Character gains +1000 Power for the turn.
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 1000, Level 1 [Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[A] [Discard a Character card with either ::Familia::, ::Guild::, or ::Hostess of Fertility:: from hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 "Ais, Reason for Her Strength", reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, choose up to 1 of your Opponent's Characters and return it to their hand, and for the turn, this may Side Attack without Soul Penalty.
[A] [(2) Discard a "Lilly, Dungeon Exploration" from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this attacks, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 of your other Characters and this, and they gain the following ability for the turn. "[A] This ability activates up to once per turn. When Damage dealt by this is Cancelled, you may deal 1 Damage to your Opponent." (Damage Cancel can occur)

[A] At the start of your Climax Phase, you may choose 2 Characters with either ::Familia::, ::Guild::, and/or ::Hostess of Fertility:: in your Waiting Room and put the on the bottom of your Clock. If you put 2 cards in Clock this way, at the end of the turn, put the bottom 2 cards of your Clock in the Waiting Room.
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 4 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, choose up to 1 Character with either ::Familia::, ::Guild::, and/or ::Hostess of Fertility:: in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, put the top 2 cards of your Library in the Waiting Room. If there were at least 1 Climax card among them, this gains +2 Soul for the turn.
[A] [Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room] When this attacks, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 of your other Characters with either ::Familia::, ::Guild::, and/or ::Hostess of Fertility:: and return it to your hand.

[C] During your Opponent's turn, all your other Characters gain +500 Power.
[S] [(2) Rest this] Put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.
[S] [Rest this] All Characters in your Opponent's Front Row gets -500 Power for the turn.

[C] For each Marker under this, this gains +4000 Power.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's a Character with either ::Familia::, ::Guild::, and/or ::Hostess of Fertility::, you may put it face-down under this as Marker. (Otherwise put it back where it was)
[A] CX COMBO When this attacks, if "Once More" is in the Climax Zone and you have 4 or more other Characters with either ::Familia::, ::Guild::, and/or ::Hostess of Fertility::, you may look at the top card of your Library. If so, put it face-down under this as Marker.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage or via the effect of [S] of "Ais & Hestia, Encounter at the Waterside" to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.
[A] CX COMBO [(2)] When this attacks, if "Deep Floors Expedition" is in the Climax Zone, you may pay cost. If so, look at up to 3 cards from top of your Opponent's Library, choose up to 3 of them and put them on top of the Library in any order, and put the rest in the Waiting Room.

[C] CX COMBO If either "Battle Training" or "Deep Floors Expedition" is in your Climax Zone, this card gains the [Choice Trigger] Trigger Icon while in any Zone.
[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is 0 or lower, you may put that Character in Stock. If so, put the bottom card of your Opponent's Stock in the Waiting Room.

[A] [(1) Send this to Memory] When your other Character with either ::Familia::, ::Guild::, and/or ::Hostess of Fertility:: is Front Attacked, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 of your Characters in battle, and that Character gains +2000 Power for the turn.
[C] If there are 3 or more cards in your Clock, this gains +3000 Power.

[A] [Put 1 of your other Characters from Stage in the Waiting Room] During your Opponent's turn, when this becomes Reversed in battle, you may pay cost. If so, Rest this, and at the start of your next Encore Step, put this in the Waiting Room.
[C] If there are 3 or more cards in your Clock, this gains +4000 Power.

[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is higher than the Level of your Opponent, you may put that Character in Stock. If so, put the bottom card of your Opponent's Stock in the Waiting Room.
[S] [(1)] This gains +1 Soul for the turn.

[C] If you have 2 or more other Characters with either ::Familia::, ::Guild::, and/or ::Hostess of Fertility::, this gains +1 Level and +2500 Power.
[C] If this is Level 3 or higher, this gains +4500 Power.
[C] If there are 3 or more cards in your Clock, this gains +8000 Power.

[C] During battles involving this, no player may play BACKUP from hand.
[A] When this attacks, if the Level of the Character Opposite this is 3 or higher, this gains +6000 Power for the turn.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Climax Zone, choose up to 1 Character with Soul Trigger Icon in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand, choose up to 2 of your Characters, and those Characters gain +1 Soul for the turn.

[A] At the start of your Climax Phase, choose 1 of your Characters with either ::Familia::, ::Guild::, and/or ::Hostess of Fertility::, and that Character gains +1000 Power for the turn.

"[A] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, you may choose a Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand."

[A] CX COMBO EXPERIENCE [Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room] When this attacks, if "[Luminous Wind]" is in the Climax Zone and the sum of Levels of cards in your Level Zone is 2 or higher, you may pay cost. If so, look at up to 3 cards from top of your Library and search for up to 3 Characters with either ::Familia::, ::Guild::, and/or ::Hostess of Fertility::, reveal them, put them in your hand, and put the rest in the Waiting Room.

[A] When your Climax card is placed in the Climax Zone, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +1500 Power until the next end of your Opponent's turn.
[A] CX COMBO [Choose a "Love Is Blind" in your Climax Zone and put it in the Waiting Room] At the start of your Encore Step, you may pay cost. If so, look at up to 2 cards from top of your Library and search for up to 2 Level X or lower cards, put them in Stock in any order, and put the rest in the Waiting Room. X = # of "[Grimoire]" in your Waiting Room. (Climax cards are considered Level 0 for this effect)

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, choose 1 of your Opponent's Characters and a Trait on that Character, and for the turn, that Character loses all instances of that Trait.

[A] [(1) Put the top card of your Library in Clock] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose a Character with either ::Familia::, ::Guild::, and/or ::Hostess of Fertility:: in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.
[A] When this attacks, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your Library, choose 1 of them and put it on top of your Library, and put the rest in your Waiting Room.

[C] ASSIST All your Characters with either ::Familia::, ::Guild::, and/or ::Hostess of Fertility:: in front of this gain +2000 Power and the following ability. "[C] This cannot be chosen as target of Opponent's effects."

Draw a card, and discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room.

"Choose a '[Hestia Knife]' in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand." "Search your Library for up to 1 '[Hestia Knife]', reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library."

[C] EXPERIENCE If the sum of Levels of cards in your Level Zone is 3 or higher, this gains +7000 Power and "[A] ENCORE [Discard a Character card from your hand to the Waiting Room]".

At the end of this card's attack, if "[Hero's Strike]" is in the Climax Zone, the sum of Levels of cards in your Level Zone is 7 or higher, and you have 3 or more other Characters with either ::Familia::, ::Guild::, and/or ::Hostess of Fertility::, you may pay cost. If so, Stand this.

[A] When this becomes Reversed in battle, you may reveal up to 3 cards from the top of your Library. If you reveal at least 1 card this way, choose up to 1 Character with either ::Familia::, ::Guild::, and ::Hostess of Fertility:: among them and put it in your hand, put the rest in the Waiting Room, and discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room.

[C] "Pyonkichi" in your hand gets -1 Level.

X = # of "[Ushiwakamaru]" in your Waiting Room.
